trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Nampa
There were no other sightings in Nampa on or around January 27th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI walked outside about ten minutes to seven, and observed a bright ball of light coming from the western sky towards my house. Very low flying, quiet with no noise, I grabbed my video camera. I taped it first from the west, from the back of my house and followed the ball to the east side of my house. It was moving very slow to the east for seven to ten minutes, heading towards Boise from Caldwell, Idaho.
Summary: Bright ball of light coming west to east
